about: Smartters is a technology company specializing in AI-driven software and enterprise solutions.

projects.name: GetHiredAT
projects.description: An AI-powered job platform that parses resumes and auto-applies for jobs.

projects.name: EduPort
projects.description: A digital education portal for universities with smart scheduling.

projects.name: Binimise
projects.description: A waste management platform used by municipal corporations.

faqs.question: Who is the CEO of Smartters?
faqs.answer: Guru is the CEO of Smartters Software.

faqs.question: What does Smartters do?
faqs.answer: Smartters builds scalable software and AI systems for enterprises.
